website_summaries.verdict: A quality robotic vacuum that efficiently cleans up a single-pet home.
pros: The bobi Pet runs quietly and smoothly
Includes the option to schedule cleaning times
Leaves virtually no pet hair behind
cons: Struggles with some throw rugs, if they are too lightweight

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is okay. I paid $200, and then saw it on Groupon for less than $150. Personally I don’t think it works that great and I wouldn’t recommend. It also took a long time to get to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kay

customer_reviews.title: I already own one and this one is super loud, doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Received this item and went to open it and use it and it is not even close to what it is supposed to be. I already own one and this one is super loud, doesn't work, and came with the wrong remote. SEems like a total scam. I rarely ever give a bad review on something. And unfortunately, this was a gift and the receiver of the gift wasn't able to set it up until about 1 month ago so I only realized this scam recently when my order was 6 months ago. DON'T BUY FROM THIS COMPANY!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Stock with IROBOT
customer_reviews.text: Bobi does a so-so job of cleaning...gets lost and doesnt make it back to the station more than half the time...gets stuck on pretty much everything...battery degraded within the warranty window and company charged for shipping (trivial and unprofessional).
customer_reviews.author: nicholas jared baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Crap.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a week or so, thus far it goes 3 ft from the charging station and then tries to find home. Followed reset instructions etc, no joy. Arrived in a box looking like it had been punted, with no documents or any of the associated tools, dust caked in the clear part of the cleaning bin. Contacted seller theonesales no response 24hrs later.
customer_reviews.author: JjH

customer_reviews.title: Navigation concerns
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. This robot navigation capabilities are poor. It worked well when I didn't have furniture. When I added a carpet, chairs and a table then it kept bumping into them. I'll try to sell it on-line.
customer_reviews.author: U

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this at all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this at all. It is not a good quality product, I've had it only a few months and have had so many issues with it. Constantly runs into things and gets stuck, the vacuum box that holds what it has sucked up has broken in two different places and the mop pads barely stick to the Velcro. I wish I would have bought another I Robot instead of going with this cheap brand. Don't wast your money!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Haldeman

customer_reviews.title: Helpful team mate with excellent customer service support if you need it.
customer_reviews.text: It's not human and has it's limitations so don't expect it to replace your manual floor cleaning but rather help prolong the need to do so because this thing always comes back with something in the bin even the day after a manual home floor cleaning... Makes us feel bad until it eats a lego or gets stuck between chair legs and then we feel better about those things that we still do better. Also , after 2 years with the product we have been through all the maintenance required and can't say enough positive things about the customer service support that they offer. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not what I would choose again.
customer_reviews.text: The convenience of this vacuum is great, but I wouldn't choose this brand and model again for a couple of reasons. The height is almost 3 1/2 inches, and it's too tall to go under the bottom of our cabinets very well. It gets stuck frequently, and I'll find it out of juice or just spinning and unable to get free. It has scratched the bottom of the cabinets because of the height issue. Also, the plastic piece that covers the filter on the dirt container is surprisingly flimsy and hard to unlatch. I've had it less than two months and I already have to be careful so it closes properly.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Buy the more expensive one
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum worked for about 3 months before the battery went bad. I ended up buying a Roomba during a Black Friday sale to replace it and the difference is astronomical. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money and get the better vacuum you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough and pretty noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes to limit the times i have to vacuum. I was very excited but unfortunately it didn't meet my expectations. I found it frustrating to watch it go over the same spots and not pick anything up. There is no rhyme or reason as to where it goes. Even using the remote control it was tough to pick basic things up like kitty litter. It's worthless on carpet as it does not have the suction power to clean properly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sturm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS ROBOT!
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts on how good this guy could really do but honestly I am very impressed! Let me say I have 4 kids 3 of which are lazy teenagers...this robot replaced a chore so there was some controversy on how things would even out. After running it one time I realized that the side brush was missing. I contacted the company and a costumer service rep Bryan helped me get what I needed and had the brushes sent very quickly! Amazing customer service! I did tell my kids that if they didn’t step up their game my Bobipet was getting one of their rooms :) You will not be disappointed! Buy this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Taraj

customer_reviews.title: Great product and with excellent support service.
customer_reviews.text: We've had our bOBi for almost a year now. It is of great assistance keeping our floors (both hard tile and carpet) neat - we have three toddlers so, a messy floor is a constant here. We recently needed some support service from the company, had some technical issues were the robot was speeding, and they sent for bOBi with a prompt and courteous response, replaced needed parts and sent it back with upgraded brushes and extra filters and mops. At all times they updated it us on any transportation or service steps being done. Overall a great product and the fact that it has such a great support if needed makes it better!
customer_reviews.author: GadgetsFan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and great value
customer_reviews.text: This is an heavy duty robotic vacuum. Large collection cup. Extra parts, filter. Cleaning brush makes maintenance a breeze. Great value. My daughter has a roomba and the bob is much more durable and powerful. We have 3 dogs and this handles the fur no problem!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: I really like this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vacuum. I got it last Christmas and use it almost every day. The only problem with it, is that the rubber brush (which is a secondary one) wears out extremely fast. I think it's due to the sand my kids constantly hauling in. I called the customer service about it and they sent a new one to me. However I asked them to make it out of a more durable rubber & he sounded like that wasn't going to be possible. Wonderful machine and overall I very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's a great product, very efficient, does the job and sweeps up even my long hair (I sometimes feel like I shed worse than a "pet"!). I'm very happy with the purchase. The motor is so powerful, that it ends up moving chairs and other objects while cleaning, so it may be good to watch it work the first time, before leaving it clean completely alone. Bob customer service recommended this to me after my old one broke, so I'm extremely happy with their attentive customer service - it's the best I've ever had to deal with. Overall, positive experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I love BOBi! Having 3 dogs and 2 cats in the house means there is hair everywhere! BoBi has been such a great investment for us. In between regular vacuuming, BoBi runs every night to ensure the carpets remain clean and hair free! I am amazed at how much this little thing can pick up! The customer service with this company is second to none. I had an issue and their rep, Daniel, went above and beyond with getting BoBi fixed up and back home in no time. I would highly recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding vacuum will take on anything and incredible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have used it daily for a few months. I recently had a hiccup with the performance- and contacted Bobi customer service. Can I say exceptional??? They could not be kinder, more supportive or ready to problem solve. The vacuum is powerful, it travels quickly across the floor, the charge seems to run ~30 minutes LONGER than advertised. It will lower itself as needed to go under some furniture and it has no issue climbing up different floor heights (transition from hardwood to tile) and does a great job of finding its home. I tried many different ones before ending up sticking with this one. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tnbiker

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... I'm in love ♡ bObi is amazing! I run her 3 times a day, and my carpet and tile look brand new, better yet, my floors look like I don't have 4 kids and a dog!!! People say on the reviews that she can't find her home and she gets stuck, while this was true the first 5 runs, she has learned each time and now she knows where home is and doesn't get stuck. When she is finished "juicing" she goes back to the areas she hadn't gotten yet... very smart! I want at least one more so I can alternate running them while one is charging... just because!
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to work very well
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I'm using it wrong or if I got a dysfunctional model, but it struggles to pick up even the smallest debris, and when it backs up it dumps stuff out. Granted I got this for my wife on her birthday and it took us forever to even getting around to trying it over the vacuum we already have but right now I'm not at all impressed. On tile it works fine as far as picking stuff up, but carpet it really doesn't do much.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.  Great product and service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent service. Have had the product about 3 months. We have a constantly shedding Beagle. We run the bobi 4 times per week and are happy with the results. It comes onwhile working and we never see it run which is great. We have tile and vinyl floors. Only complaint is that on thin rugs and fluffy rugs it gets stuck. We roll ours up and let it go. Customer service is excellent. Probably the best service ever. Very responsive via email. Cant say enough about how good there service is. Im very analytical and critical when something is not right. There service is right.
customer_reviews.author: matter of fact

customer_reviews.title: Used, dirty and sticky.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and when I opened it, it is obvious that this was a used product. The brush on the robot had hair and dirt in it. The bottom of itnis dirty and sticky. The charging station is also dirty and sticky. The bag that holds the extra brushes was opened. It looked like the items were just thrown in there. None of the glass on the charging station, remote control nor the block have protective plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Practical for some but not all
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas. We have 4 large dogs and this was intended to be somewhat autonomous. It works fine BUT it does get hung up frequently around chair and table legs and cannot complete a room without help. Needless to say, my wife does not quite have the patience to manually re-route it when it does get stuck. Net result, she still vacuums the old fashion way. Maybe try to find a new home for this little guy with more open floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Derwent

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely magical. We use it everyday for our hardwood floor and carpets and its magical. We live in a mountain cabin with 2 large dogs and a very muddy yard. The doggy door is always open so dirt and hair gets everywhere. Bobi takes great care of that and lets us know when its time to empty him and his filter. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bobi
customer_reviews.text: Being a full time mom and having a full time job, having Bobi vacuum my floors every day is an incredible help. It's so nice to come home to a clean floor with no cat hair or dust bunnies. Bobi does get stuck sometimes, but it's usually my fault for leaving items on the floor, like socks and rubber bands. This is my 2nd Bobi and I recommend them to all of my friends. I don't know if I could live without my Bobi after having one for several years. I Love my Bobi!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Libonati

customer_reviews.title: ... for almost a year now and have been definitively satisfied with her work
customer_reviews.text: We have had our Bobi vacuum for almost a year now and have been definitively satisfied with her work. She cleans each night for about 1&1/2 hrs and returns to her dock without issue. We have had the battery replaced once but that’s not bad considering the constant workload she has maintained. The customer service has been stellar. Also, there was an issue with the left wheel and again the Bobsweep team sent us one free of charge. We have 2 large breed dogs and because of Bobi our floors stay hair-free. The price of this vacuum is certainly competitive in today’s market and well worth the value! I highly recommend the Bobi vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my bobi two years ago and I have absolutely loved her! I run her nearly every night and she has held up beautifully in my house with 2 songs and 2 kids. Whether it’s Cheerios or fuzzy balls, bobi sucks it up. The customer service is phenomenal as well! Last year I had an issue with one of her wheels. I sent her in and they fixed her in no time under the warranty. She even came home with a “hospital report” to tell us about her journey. It was a fantastic experience and this is a fantastic company!
customer_reviews.author: Shay VK

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum just side sweep bristles need to be longer.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this vacuum it finds its charging base and does a good job cleaning. The only thing I would change is the spinning side brush. The bristles are not long enough to sweep the dirt from the wall edge to in front of the vacuum. If those were longer and as long as it last and keeps doing the job it's doing I would give it 5 stars. Update: One side of the door on the dust compartment broke where it hinges open it is still working right now but hopefully the other side of the door does not break.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: In less than a year trash
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about any robot vac... I should have not ordered. In less than a year maybe 8 months, my bobi vac quit sucking. I mean just didnt pick up anything. And I cleaned it every use. 219.00 down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Cottage People

customer_reviews.title: Theres a learning curve but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to get used to it and still figuring it out but does great with getting up dirt. First few times it gave me a hard time with going from floor to carpet but its learning to so i guess we are learning together lol. Would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have two long-hair dogs and Bobi does a great job of keeping the dog hair in check
customer_reviews.text: We have two long-hair dogs and Bobi does a great job of keeping the dog hair in check. We run her every few days, and usually have to empty & clean her multiple times on each cleaning session. She's strong enough to push the kitchen chairs around on the hardwood floor, too! A few of the parts on the dustbin that have to be opened are a bit fragile, and my wife broke one. The customer service responded very quickly & sent a replacement dustbin ASAP for no charge. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, even better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does a great job. With two Rhodesian Ridgebacks it can be a full time job sweeping up their wheaten needles on the dark floor, and this handles it well across carpet and tile. It finds the charging station often enough to not be a big deal when I do have to manually get it there. I wish the collection tray was a bit bigger but again not a huge issue for the benefit we get from it. The cord went bad after a few months of consistent use and I cannot say enough great things about the quality, care, and thoroughness of their customer service. Truly a breath of fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: FadJ

customer_reviews.title: An useful cleanser at home
customer_reviews.text: It is very lovely toy for cleaning. It cleans rooms smoothly and quietly around and never misses a corner. Since it comes, I do not need to worry about the dust under beds. All of features described is as good as it is introduced at Amazon. However, it doesn’t introduce its navigating ability is so low that it is not able to follow my instruction where it should go.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Huang

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver BobSweep
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Bobi almost a year ago because I wasn’t able to keep up with my vacuuming. Between a baby and a husky, I could have vaccines daily and that just wasn’t possible. Bobi has been a life saver and time saver for our family. Our vacuum runs every other day and does a great job of maintaining our home throughout our busy week. Recently, our Bobi was not working properly, and the customer service was outstanding! They took Bobi in, fixed/cleaned him up, and sent him back as quick as possible. I would definitely recommend a BobSweep product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great if you own a house that has nothing in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great if you own a house that has nothing in it. If you do have some furniture in your house, as I do, it's a great workout. I burned 10000 calories in just one hour from rushing over to free it, (every 2.1 seconds) from what ever obstacle it had trapped itself in, again and again...... Maybe we just got a slow learner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: "She" cleans very well. I don't understand her patterns of cleaning, or why she keeps going in the same areas several times. She gets stuck quite a bit under my furniture or on top of my floor grates, and I have to rescue her. Her clear plastic covering on top has cracked somehow, but she still works. My animals are not a big fan, so I have to be around when it's running to stop her from being attacked or running over toys or hairballs. Other than that, I really like it and think it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dementia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave it unattended!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty displeased. I thought it was safe to turn the thing on and let it run. Well, it turns out that the sensors don’t work as well as they should. It runs through the house knocking stuff over and pushing things around. It knocked over a fake tree and pushed it around. The tree ended up scratching up my new hardwood floors really bad. It will even push around my heavy kitchen chairs. However, it won’t get close enough to walls or counters to actually pick up the mess underneath them. You can’t leave this thing unattended without it messing up your house, so you might as well just vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bell

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time or money. The only thing his has done for my household is make me more frustrated. Complete waste of money. Gets stuck on everything, never finds its charging station, the mop is a joke,t and my cat hates it. Seriously though do not purchase. Spend your money on a Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Customer service has been helpful but its getting annoying how many things have gone wrong so far
customer_reviews.text: Having some issues with Bobi, Customer service has been helpful but its getting annoying how many things have gone wrong so far, The remote was shorting out within the first couple days, she couldn't find her base after the first week, now she's not responding to her remote commands.. They have sent me a new remote and a new charger base so far but its getting annoying having to wait for new things to come in so she works right.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer support
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a must when you have a pet. It cleans most of the hair left by my two dogs and cat. This being said the reason I love this thing so much is the warranty. It came with a one-year warranty but they upgraded to two for free. I’m supposed to pay for shipping when I have a problem but they covered every time. I have had two issues and those were solved with ease when talking to the customer service department. This company has been more than good to me. I will purchase again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mills

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love my bObi!! She has certainly met my expectations since receiving her. I programmed her to start every morning before we get up for the day and by the time we arise the job is done!! Now if I could get her to dust my furniture and wash my windows!! She cleans up easily. I waited until she had run three days then emptied the hair and dust and was very surprised to see how much she could hold. I have hardwoods so there are no carpets. Even my cats don't mind her getting her job done. So far, I am pleased and love my bObi pet!
customer_reviews.author: C. Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with battery longevity
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple of months, the vacuum worked really well but over the last few months the time my Bobi actually works has dwindled to less than 10 minutes. Very disappointing considering I've had it less than a year and over that year have probably used it less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: MizzouGirl

customer_reviews.title: In love, can't think of any negatives
customer_reviews.text: Day 2 of having bObi, and so far so good. The packaging is super cute also - just a nice added bonus. Shipped and arrived very fast. Really easy to set up and empty. Barely needed the instructions. Cleans our floors really well (wood with area rugs) - handles the transition for hard floor to carpet like a champ and easily handle the area rug edge. We have cats and kids, and dark wood floors, so all their sand and fur is very easy to spot. BObi has already made my life so much easier. Nice design as well. Team bObi!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Gave up on this
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a few years ago and never got it working right. We had sent it to the manufacturer and had them look at it, dealt with tech support for a while, and never got my carpet swept. Maybe I got a lemon but I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Seth W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my bObi as I have 3 animals that shed constantly. It does a great job! One day, however, my bObi stopped working and I had a FANTASTIC customer service experience. They were attentive, kind and responsive. I received my machine back quickly and it's been working perfectly since. The product is great and the service is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Bunger

customer_reviews.title: Tough little vacuum with great  customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I got this vacuum on a great deal. After about one month of use the hinge to the dustbin broke. I contacted bobi customer service and they sent me a whole new dustbin free of charge. They also shipped it for free and it vane very quickly! This vacuum does a good Hopi of getting pretty hair. It is also very strong, it will push dining chairs around and driving over the dog. I would definitely recommend this for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Athay

customer_reviews.title: Bunny Approved
customer_reviews.text: Love my Bobi! I have pet rabbits and they can really make a mess of my home with their hay. Hair and hay is no match for this vacuume! I do have it on a schedule but use the remote often if I track in dirt or something like that just hit "GO" on the remote! Bobi fits underneath the tv stand and other furniture so its getting all the hair and dust id never get sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: Bellealyn

customer_reviews.title: You need bobi 2.0 - it’s a must have
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the original bobi and loved it but alas after years of daily cleaning it was time to upgrade to 2.0. I didn’t know what I was missing!!! Not only is the 2.0 design sleek (LOVE the silver) it also spent hours picking up pet hair in places I didn’t even realized it had made its way to, areas my cleaning lady had missed. Thank goodness for Bobi, I will forever be a bobi customer, this is my favorite robotic vacuum and totally worth the cost to upgrade to 2.0.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Great robot vac
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum, but does get stuck on throw rugs. Just have to do a little prep before you set her on her way. Support is excellent. Have had a couple minor issues and they have worked with me to get Bobi up and running quickly!
customer_reviews.author: danni

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean the carpet in my den. I have a baby gate for my dog and she has a doggie door. She always keeps my den messy. I constantly clean up, but she makes the room a mess right away. So far this product cleans the room pretty well. I have used it only once right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Bobi Pet overall not a great choice .
customer_reviews.text: It’s convenient to have when a quick vacuum is needed . Not a replacement for a regular vacuum cleaner since it only picks up surface dust . Bumps into most things in its path . Doesn’t find its base as its supposed to even after being synced. Seems to circle in the seem area unless rerouted with remote .
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: Over the last 10 years, I've owned 3 Roombas, 1 BobSweep and now the new bObi Pet vacuum. It's by far the most intelligent, quietest and most thorough one I've used. It's low enough to go under furniture and smart enough to traverse between hardwood and tile floors as well as rug. Overall it's a great product and happy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Real work horse!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second model and I'm loving it. I really like that there is the regular dust bin plus a finer filtered part that really catches the fine dirt and dust. We have two cats and 1 dog and Bobi is pretty much used daily. She is a real work horse. I've also noticed that the battery life is much longer on this model. We are very happy with Bobi.
customer_reviews.author: RobininFresno

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bobi! I got mine in March this year and used it every day. I have 4 dogs and it does a great job with the pet hair. About a month ago I noticed it was not holding a charge and would go back to it's dock after about 15 minutes. I contacted the company and the customer service rep helped me run some tests on it. Once the tests failed, it was determined the battery was bad. They sent out a new battery at no charge! Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an expensive dy#$n vacuum I can run it and then let my bObi Pet go right after and it picks up a lot of pet hair left by the vacuum. It gets stuck under a few things but it beeps to let me known it needs help getting unstuck. It picks up cat litter and larger particles without problem. I have not used the mop attachment yet or the block feature yet. . It has not problem switching from tile, to carpet, or hardwood. It does great over the kitchen rugs as well. All in all for the price I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Not great with pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs, this just didn’t do the job for us (I sweep once a day even with this vacuum, and even found myself having to sweep again after it because of how little dog fur it picked up)
customer_reviews.author: Geena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent home robot. You think your house is clean? Just wait until bObi cleans for you. You will be amazed at how much you don't clean enough. Mine has been in service cleaning daily for almost 8 months and our house is definitely cleaner and healthier with less work. We don't call it a robot it's part o four family at this point. My wife literally cannot live without it anymore. This will pay for itself just in the time it saves you cleaning. Can't go wrong. Manufacture customer service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Jsw

customer_reviews.title: bObi Pet Vacuum works great! And their customer service personnel is very very good; thanks, Gabe! You're the best.... WCP
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in NYC, and customer service with bObi pet robotic vacuum was a stellar standout, Gabe is his name and he was great. My daughter was able to get helpful information and warranty details directly from Gabe and she, too, is very pleased with the customer service. Although she lives in a small apartment her cats generate a lot of hair/fur on the floor and she indicates the bObi pet robotic vacuum is super efficient and doesn't alarm her two cats, one follows it around the floor while the other just watches it while safely perched on the sofa. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: WCP

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got a bObi as a gift and fell in love with a product I never thought I would need. It made my life so much easier and kept me from having to vacuum up pet hair every single day. Unfortunately I had an issue where that bObi broke but when I reached out to the company I received nothing but incredible customer service. The folks at bObi (Carlo) helped me obtain an upgraded replacement and checked in with me after I received it to make sure I didn't have any issues. It was such a refreshing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: It Ate our dogs Tail!  Had to break the vaccume to get our dogs tail out after it sucked his tail in!  Broke our dogs tail!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it thinking it would be pet safe, but it caught our dogs tail & pulled his tail in injuring his tail & we had to break this vaccume tonget his tail out. Never again will I trust this around our pets.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rott

customer_reviews.title: The gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and her BF because they both are very busy and have 4 large dogs and a long-haired cat. It works wonders on cutting down the dust debris and pet hair. They both love it and wonder how they ever got along without it.
customer_reviews.author: AZ_Momma

customer_reviews.title: Kids, crayons and awesome warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that has exceeded our expectations. We have 3 kids and wood floors and this easily keeps up with the demands of kids who always play outside. We have had several friends buy one after they have seen how efficient and time saving this is. The vacuum power is so strong it sucks up crayons and we didn't even know we're there. Best customer service I have worked with. When we had an issue they were helpful and sent us a replacement due to its outstanding warranty. Ours is named Rosie( like off the Jetsons)
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but...
customer_reviews.text: Well, out of the box the bObi is a beauty, however, on its first outing in my house it stuck itself under my dishwasher. Wouldn’t be a problem, but with all of the back and forth of it freeing itself the top was quite scratched. Seems like a good product so far but really wish it still looked new after the first run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the vacuum is the customer service from bObsweep
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I ever lived without my bObi Pet! I have 2 dogs who are constantly shedding, and thanks to bObi, you would never know. Incredible vacuum for the price. Even better than the vacuum is the customer service from bObsweep. My previous vacuum was acting funny, and they took her in, fixed her up, and sent her right back in perfect condition. They also gave me up updates along the way and took amazing care of both my bObi and I. Extremely grateful for this vacuum and the wonderful service I've been given. Thanks to bObi, I'm able to have a few mins to myself each day and not stress the daily cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pets
customer_reviews.text: We vacuum regularly but with 2 dogs it is never enough. I use the Bobi Pet almost every day and it keeps the pet hair in check between vacuuming. The reason I did not give this full 5 stars is: More than once parts fell of when vacuuming The sensors could be better. It often knocks over/moves chairs or gets stuck on the edge of the stairs or under furniture
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Clean floors and happy dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bobi Scarlet is a mean cleaning machine! Battery life is as advertised, I’ll review in a few months or so to update. I like the fact that the dogs are scared of it by the noise, I can tell it’s running but not super loud. Hasn’t had an issue with it getting stuck on furniture or knocking into as other reports have led on, unless it’s in juice mode and then it will.
customer_reviews.author: MostDef

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 4 days
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked properly for a couple days and then it stopped cleaning properly. All the hair and the residues from the floor where cleaned only to be found in the floor again a couple minutes later. The vacuum and all it’s components were cleaned several times but the issue was not solved. Even though the unit worked great for 4 days I would not recommend to buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good outfit
customer_reviews.text: I had the bobi original and after replacing the drive wheels I upgraded to the bobi pet. I have hardwood floors throughout my house with an occasional throw rug and bobi keeps it spotless. BUT because it is hardwood the bobi gets excellent traction and will try to climb up curved chair legs and under places she won't fit to the point of being a little destructive. I am going to try something on the drive wheels to take away some traction and see if it helps. Maybe a quicker direction change would help.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Baker

customer_reviews.title: We use her solely on tiled floors and she is great at keeping our dust bunnies and tumblefurweeds at bay
customer_reviews.text: We have had our bObi for almost two years now and she has been a welcomed member to the family! We use her solely on tiled floors and she is great at keeping our dust bunnies and tumblefurweeds at bay. She does have a little trouble with running into things and her collection bin is a little small for the volume we throw at her. Overall though, I am grateful she is here and doing her work well. The best part is the customer service's super positive and helpful attitudes when we had to send her back for a little check up.
customer_reviews.author: Capt.Mal

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chore helper
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vacuum. I have had bObi Pet for ten months now, and have no complaints. This little vacuum does a great job picking up the hair from my chocolate lab, all of the crumbs left by my kids, and all of the dust and dirt throughout the house. I love to just turn the vacuum on and go about my business while she cleans. I do take the time to clean her more often than I ever have with a conventional upright vacuum, which I find to be a pleasant experience. Customer service is extremely helpful. I would highly recommend this product if you are in the market for a robotic vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and even more amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our Bobi vacuum. Ever since our purchase, he’s cut our cleaning time more than in half due to our lovely puppy that runs around shedding her hair constantly. Bobi works just as expected and we would recommend this product to everyone. Also, Bobi can have parts that wear out, and I wanted to mention how excellent the customer service is for this product. Specifically, we worked with Anne, who was very attentive and thorough each time we communicated. Having a superior product and incredible customer service really makes this product a purchase we most certainly will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I have hardwood floors and some rugs on the hardwood, it cleans both impeccably. I also have four Chihuahuas that shed. My goodness I never have to do a thing it cleans all the hair from every nook and cranny. It just rolls along and does all of my floors, everyone needs this fabulous product!!!! Love it!!! Also the employees I spoke with were over the top nice and knowledgeable... thank you
customer_reviews.author: carol ann kesterson

customer_reviews.title: Bobi saved my life :)
customer_reviews.text: Bobi Pet is amazing! I have two cats and a dog so hair and kitty litter was always an issue. Bobi saves me from having to sweep daily and because you can schedule it, I come home from work with freshly swept floors. The price was perfect and if you’re looking for an inexpensive robot vacuum that works. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric KeeGin

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: A really great vacuum. It works in floor and carpet. Sometime it gets stuck in the furniture
customer_reviews.author: Wilmaura Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service !!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had some trouble with the bOb Sweep pet after 1 1/2 years of his services. I emailed the customer service and I have to say, they are outstanding. I was in touch with ONE person who really cared about my problems with the product. When we got to the point where he could make the decision that's best for us he informed his supervisor and they offered 3 workable solutions. I went for an upgrade to the newer version and we love love love it !!! A big "Thank you!" to the customer service team for your straightforward help !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: works like I wish my family would
customer_reviews.text: bObi is perfect, it works like I wish my family would (HAHAHA!!). bObi is small enough to git under my cabinets, high enough off the ground to switch with no issues to my tall rug, quiet enough to talk over with no issue, has a dust bin large enough to run, and clean thoroughly after my 5 dogs. bObsweep as a company is quite amazing, very family feeling, follows up regularly, and is great with warranty, concerns or suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: ... and running for about a week now and I'm delighted with the job it does
customer_reviews.text: We've had the bObi Pet up and running for about a week now and I'm delighted with the job it does. Granted it occasionally gets itself into a situation where exiting becomes problematic but we are learning to deal with those furniture configurations. I have found that confining it to a specific area or room is generally the best way to utilize it's talents, though with 3 Labs there is always plenty of work to be done around the house. Very impressed with the battery life. Getting 120 min. runs before needing a recharge and having a remote is a big plus. So overall I'd say we are quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Sensors really suck.
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed at all. Sensors worked only half the time as it moved all the chairs and even knocked them over. Also, cleans randomly.... you just hope it gets the right spot. Where it cleaned, it worked well enough. But it was more chaotic than just random.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Game changer at my house!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, two dogs, and 3 children. This Vacuum has restored my sanity by keeping the floors tidy everyday. More than that- service and communication from the company are stellar. Call and a human answers! Highly recommend, affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hecker

customer_reviews.title: An ok alternative to Roomba
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. Definitely not the smartest robot. Continuously gets stuck and banging into walls. I use nearly every day and has made life easier but it’s taller than the other robot vacuums on market and can’t get under cabinet lip in kitchen or bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great in my house
customer_reviews.text: I had always wanted one of these robotic type vacuum cleaners and this one was priced right. It came quickly and had everything I needed to get started. It works great in my house, I have four cats. The only problem I have had, is that I have too many things on the floor, I definitely have to tidy up before I let Bobby go crazy. I like using the remote control to concentrate on areas with dustbunnies.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tiger

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum! I have it scheduled to run every day at 6pm. We have 3 indoor cats and a black lab AND wall-to-wall carpet and this little vacuum is able to keep on top of it. I do empty the dustbin daily, but considering the amount of fur on our carpets that's not a surprise. We named our vacuum Perky and she is a valued member of the family now! She's relatively quiet and very great at picking up fine cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fry

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: No stars would be more apprapos. It arrived. I charged it over night. It vacuumed for literally two seconds then stopped...and this continued over and over on hardwoods and carpeting. It simply does not work as advertised. I'm just glad I didn't spend a ton of money on it. I'll come back and let you know how the customer service is after I request a refund. I'll be looking at a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... had our BObi for a few weeks and we LOVE it. It is currently cleaning the living room ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had our BObi for a few weeks and we LOVE it. It is currently cleaning the living room after four girls, two dogs, and a bag of popcorn had a late night party while I am enjoying a cup of tea. BObi gets into corners, under furniture, and does a great job with pet hair. We haven't tried some of the features such as the remote timer or the mop function, but will update the review once we have. It is important to set up the room properly so bObi doesn't get stuck, but that is a minor hassle compared to not having to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It does a great job for in between vacuuming with your larger vacuum. I just turn it on and let it go. It really picks up the pet hairs. I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Schindler Snacks

customer_reviews.title: She's a pretty girl, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I named her Rosie. She was a nice asset to the family when she first moved it; however she didn't last long. She couldn't seem to hold her battery charge. Rosie was returned. I miss her
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Wow costumer service is amazing and they are super helpful
customer_reviews.text: Wow costumer service is amazing and they are super helpful. They stood behind there product, so when i had problem with mine, that i bought 2 years ago they were very apt to help and make it right, you just dont get that much anymore. Thanks again Bob and crew!
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: My new pet...bObi
customer_reviews.text: Great for general cleanup of pet hair and dirt. The sweeper is easy to clean and does a great job. We have this run each day to keep up with the pet hair. Even when I think the place is spotless, bObi seems to find the pet hair I can't see. Love it so far...
customer_reviews.author: SKYGUY

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line robot and great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: The bObi pet is a fantastic robot vacuum. I have run it at least daily for three months and would buy it again without question. No robot vacuum is perfect and home adjustments are required for the bOBi pet just as adjustments were required for my iRobot I have owned for five years. The bObi outperforms my roomba in many areas. When I had a wheel break on my bObi the support team immediately helped me identify the problem and sent the replacement part promptly. I think the bObi pet is the best robot vacuum for the money.
customer_reviews.author: timothy sikora

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum and easy to set up. Not very loud. The remote did have an issue where it stopped working and wouldn't sync. I e-mailed the bobi customer service and received a reply from Jared immediately! Not only did he help me try to troubleshoot the remote, he ended up sending me a completely brand new remote 2 days later.. for free! Jared even went as far to make sure everything was working properly after I got my new remote. The bobi is back up to running smoothly and continues to clean effectly. Would definitely recommend to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: The bObi does a great job vacuuming the floor
customer_reviews.text: The bObi does a great job vacuuming the floor. After several months it still miss part of the two rooms that it is set to cover. Quite powerful, it likes to push chairs around the hard wood floor in one of the rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Great on carpet and hardwood flooring!
customer_reviews.text: We love our bObi. So much so that we've given him two nicknames and you know what they say, the more nicknames you have, the more loved you are! bObi has been great on carpet and hardwood floors. We don't use his mop as much as we could but it is handy having both options. Also, their customer service is THE BEST! Would definitely recommend! #thisisnotanad
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great robotic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying having this vacuum. It took a couple of days before it got all of the hair but then it works wonderfully. With 2 dogs and 2 cats, we would have dust bunnies of hair all of the time on our hardwood floor. Now, we don't which is spectacular. Being able to program when it cleans is wonderful. It also does corners much better than I thought. The only negative is having to empty the dust bin once or twice while it runs. Also, it keeps turning itself off by hitting door stoppers - it's just the right height.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: High performance robo vac!
customer_reviews.text: Great price...great performance. Does a great job with nightly vacuuming and sweeping. The difference it has made with pet hair accumulation is phenomenal! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Svet

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Such a great customer service team. They go above and beyond. Love our new Bobi vacuum, she's a little beast and works well for our needs.If I ever have trouble, they are quick to make it right. Wish other companies were as customer service oriented as BobSweep!
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had our Bobi vacuum for almost a year now and have been very impressed with her work and the customer service provided. When I think my floors are decently cleaned, Bobi surprises me each time with how full her dust pan is. It makes me want to use her everyday to ensure my floors are clean. I have also been very impressed with the customer service from the company. By far the best I’ve dealt with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, takes time finding the base at time ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, takes time finding the base at time but works great. The suction power is strong i found my wallet strap in dirt bin so works great lol. Doesn't do well on my rugs but i just pick them up out the way.
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vacuum/price
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has been nothing but a help for our house of 8 pets. We have it set on a timer to run every night which makes it amazing to wake up to a clean floor each day. the remote is easy to setup and follow - there is nothing hard to use about this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Gina O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Dog hair eater
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. Would be nice if it mapped out the house but it done just go blind over the same areas
customer_reviews.author: John baker

customer_reviews.title: Move over Rumba....
customer_reviews.text: So we named ours Sunspot. I love this machine. I have two dogs a cat and a two year old, and this thing changed my life. Does a great job with pet hair. Is so easy to clean it's crazy. Plus you can't get a better vacuum for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie R

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean good
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up like I thought it would. Bought it bc reviews showed good for pet hair but is too slow and misses over half of the stuff. I will just stick to sweeping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: bObsweep bObi Pet Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, Scarlet
product_meta.description:
Color:Scarlet

 Cheer up your pets with a robot vacuum that is specially made for fur-filled homes. When your dogs and cats are too tired to clean up after themselves, bObi springs to life with her TurboLift™ vacuum and back-to-back brushes. Her dustbin is fully washable, so you can clean out every last pet hair. bObi comes with the bObi blOck accessory, which lets you create an invisible wall across the floor.
feature_bullets: bObi features luxurious looks in a compact design. Silicone touch sensors and embedded wall sensor allow soft, bumper-less detection and navigation.
Back-to-back rubber and bristle brushes scoop in extra dirt and scraps. Rinse bObi's fully washable dustbin for easy maintenance and a complete clean.
bObi comes with a FullCommand remote to give you control of navigation and schedule automatic cleaning for up to 7 days.
bObi blOck creates an invisible wall so you can section off a space.
bObi is backed by a 2-year limited warranty, 5 years of subsidized service, and an amazing, US-based support team.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,008 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Remote Control included, Charging Station included, BObi blOck included, Charging Adapter included, Batteries included
